topic.title: Using Web Author with the Built-in WebDAV Server

body.p: includes a built-in WebDAV server that contains various sample documents stored in a file structure on your local computer in the following directory: [WEB_AUTHOR_INSTALL_DIR]/tomcat/webapps/oxygen-xml-web-author/webdav-server. Assuming the WebDAV Server plugin is enabled in your installation of , the sample documents can be found in the Samples tab on the Web Author Dashboard.The built-in WebDAV server is included for evaluation purposes only and should not be used in production. You can disable the server by disabling the WebDAV Server plugin.

section.title: Opening or Creating Files
section.p: To open one of the sample files, go to the main Dashboard and go to the Samples tab or the WebDAV tab, browse for the document, and double-click it (or tap on a mobile device). To create a new document, go to the WebDAV tab and click on New in the top-right corner.
